articles.author: Hassan Mujtaba
articles.title: Intel Arc B580 “Battlemage” GPU Leak Confirms 12 GB Memory, Custom Models With Standard Power Connectors, Up To 2.8 GHz Clocks - Wccftech
articles.description: Intel's first Arc B580 GPUs based on the Xe2 Battlemage architecture have been leaked & they look quite compelling.
articles.content:
Intel's first Arc B580 GPUs based on the Xe2 "Battlemage" architecture have been leaked & they look quite compelling.
It looks like Intel will be the first with the next-generation GPU launches,… [+3181 chars]
